content: Yes, I am aware of Careem. Careem is a transportation network company that operates in the Middle East and North Africa, offering ride-hailing, ride-sharing, and taxi services. It was founded in Dubai in 2012 and was acquired by Uber in early 2020. Careem is considered one of the leading ride-hailing companies in the region and is available in over 100 cities across the Middle East, North Africa, and South Asia.
